data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
"DBQuery" allows you to query some information from some different
    type databases, like mysql, postgresql and oracle, so our system
    need module which include DBD::mysql, DBD::PgPP and DBD::Oracle.

    In furture, it'll support more and more database types if you want.
    You can use "DBQuery" very expediently. so we use database easily.

    This lib can use dsn which contains all connection infomation or
    use all single items, like db_host, db_pass etc.
